          <title>
            <string language="hu">Francois Girardon: Apolló és a nimfák, 1666-73. Versailles, királyi kastély. Márvány.</string>
            <string language="en">Francois Girardon: Apollo and the Nymphs, 1666-73. Versailles, royal palace. marble.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Francois Girardon: Apollo und die Nymphen,

            <string language="x-mt-fr">Francois Girardon : Apollo et les nymphes,

            <string language="x-mt-pt">Francois Girardon: Apollo e as ninfas,

            <string language="x-mt-it">Francois Girardon: Apollo e le crisalidi,

            <string language="hu">Szoborcsoport az Apollót főrdető nimfákkal</string>

geben</string>
          </description>
